xrefdescription.para: Max number of commands per second

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Maximum number of commands that can be sent out by SC in any given second.

simplesect.title: Limits:
simplesect.para: This parameter can't be larger than an unsigned 16 bit integer (65535), but should be kepoot relatively small to avoid SC hogging the CPU

xrefdescription.para: Number of RTS's

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: The number of RTS's allowed in the system

simplesect.title: Limits:
simplesect.para: This parameter can't be larger than 999.This parameter will dicate the size of The RTS Info Table.

xrefdescription.para: Max buffer size for an ATS in uint16s

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: The max sizeof an ATS buffer in words (not bytes)

simplesect.title: Limits:
simplesect.para: This parameter can't be larger than an unsigned 16 bit integer (65535).

xrefdescription.para: Max buffer size for an Append ATS in uint16s

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: The max sizeof an Append ATS buffer in words (not bytes)

simplesect.title: Limits:
simplesect.para: This parameter cannot be larger than SC_ATS_BUFF_SIZE.

xrefdescription.para: Max buffer size for an RTS in uint16s

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: The max size of an RTS buffer in WORDS (not bytes)

simplesect.title: Limits:
simplesect.para: This parameter can't be larger than an unsigned 16 bit integer (65535).

xrefdescription.para: Max number of commands in each ATS

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: The maximum number of commands that are allowed in each ATS

simplesect.title: Limits:
simplesect.para: This parameter can't be larger than an unsigned 16 bit integer (65535).

xrefdescription.para: The last RTS that will be sent with an SC_RTS_START_INF_EID event message

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: When all RTS's are started, the SC_RTS_START_INF_EID event message is sent out. This parameter suppreses that message for all RTS's over this number

simplesect.title: Limits:
simplesect.para: This parameter needs to be less than or equal to SC_NUMBER_OF_RTS

xrefdescription.para: Minimum Packet Size

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: This parameter specifies the minumum size for an ATS or RTS command.

simplesect.title: Limits:
simplesect.para: This parameter must be greater than or equal to CFE_SB_CMD_HDR_SIZE and less than or equal to CFE_SB_MAX_SB_MSG_SIZE.

xrefdescription.para: Maximum Packet Size

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: This parameter specifies the maximum size for an ATS or RTS command.

simplesect.title: Limits:
simplesect.para: This parameter must be greater than or equal to SC_PACKET_MIN_SIZE and less than or equal to CFE_SB_MAX_SB_MSG_SIZE.

xrefdescription.para: Command Pipe Depth

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Maximum number of messages that will be allowed in the SC command pipe at one time. Used during initialization in the call to CFE_SB_CreatePipe

simplesect.title: Limits:
simplesect.para: This parameter must be greater than zero and less than or equal to CFE_SB_MAX_PIPE_DEPTH.

xrefdescription.para: ATS Table Filenames

detaileddescription.para:
Description:
Filenames for the ATS tables loaded at startup are constructed by appending a one digit table identifier plus the extension ".tbl" to the base portion of the filename defined here. The default definitions will create ATS filenames as follows: "/cf/apps/sc_ats1.tbl or /cf/apps/sc_ats2.tbl"

simplesect.title: Limits:
simplesect.para: SC requires that this name be defined, but otherwise places no limits on the definition. If the named table file does not exist at run time, or the table fails validation, then the table load will fail. Refer to #OS_MAX_PATH_LEN for filename length limits.

xrefdescription.para: Append ATS Table Filename

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: This name describes the default append ATS filename loaded at startup. Often the default Append ATS file contains only a single unused table entry, and is used only to initialize the table state as having data that may be patched.

simplesect.title: Limits:
simplesect.para: SC requires that this name be defined, but otherwise places no limits on the definition. If the named table file does not exist at run time, or the table fails validation, then the table load will fail. Refer to #OS_MAX_PATH_LEN for filename length limits.

xrefdescription.para: RTS Table Filenames

detaileddescription.para:
Description:
Filenames for the RTS tables loaded at startup are constructed by appending a one digit table identifier plus the extension ".tbl" to the base portion of the filename defined here. The default definitions will create RTS filenames as follows: "/cf/apps/sc_rts001.tbl, /cf/apps/sc_rts002.tbl, etc"

simplesect.title: Limits:
simplesect.para: SC requires that this name be defined, but otherwise places no limits on the definition. If the named table file does not exist at run time, or the table fails validation, then the table load will fail. Refer to #OS_MAX_PATH_LEN for filename length limits.

xrefdescription.para: ATS Table Object Names

detaileddescription.para:
Description:
Unique table object names are required for each table registered with cFE Table Services. ATS table object names are constructed by appending a one digit table identifier to the base portion of the object name defined here. The default definitions will create ATS object names as follows: "ATS_TBL1 or ATS_TBL2"

simplesect.title: Limits:
simplesect.para: SC requires that this name be defined, but otherwise places no limits on the definition. Refer to CFE_TBL_MAX_NAME_LENGTH for specific information on limits related to table object names.

xrefdescription.para: Append ATS Table Object Names

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Unique table object names are required for each table registered with cFE Table Services. This is the table object name for the Append ATS table.

simplesect.title: Limits:
simplesect.para: SC requires that this name be defined, but otherwise places no limits on the definition. Refer to CFE_TBL_MAX_NAME_LENGTH for specific information on limits related to table object names.

xrefdescription.para: RTS Table Object Names

detaileddescription.para:
Description:
Unique table object names are required for each table registered with cFE Table Services. RTS table object names are constructed by appending a three digit table identifier to the base portion of the object name defined here. The default definitions will create RTS object names as follows: "RTS_TBL001, RTS_TBL002, etc"

simplesect.title: Limits:
simplesect.para: SC requires that this name be defined, but otherwise places no limits on the definition. Refer to CFE_TBL_MAX_NAME_LENGTH for specific information on limits related to table object names.

xrefdescription.para: Name of the RTS Infomation Table

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Name of the RTS Information Table

simplesect.title: Limits:
simplesect.para: Must be less than CFE_TBL_MAX_NAME_LENGTH

xrefdescription.para: Name of the RTP Control block table

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Name of the RTP Control Block Table

simplesect.title: Limits:
simplesect.para: Must be less than CFE_TBL_MAX_NAME_LENGTH

xrefdescription.para: Name of the ATS Infomation Table

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Name of the ATS Information Table

simplesect.title: Limits:
simplesect.para: Must be less than CFE_TBL_MAX_NAME_LENGTH

xrefdescription.para: Name of the Append ATS Infomation Table

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Name of the Append ATS Information Table

simplesect.title: Limits:
simplesect.para: Must be less than CFE_TBL_MAX_NAME_LENGTH

xrefdescription.para: Name of the ATP Control block table

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Name of the ATP Control Block Table

simplesect.title: Limits:
simplesect.para: Must be less than CFE_TBL_MAX_NAME_LENGTH

xrefdescription.para: Name Prefix of ATS Cmd Status Table

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: The prefix of the ATS Command Status table names. Note that actual table names will have a 1 digit number postfixed to it depending on the ATS number

simplesect.title: Limits:
simplesect.para: Total length must be less than CFE_TBL_MAX_NAME_LENGTH

xrefdescription.para: Defnies default state of Continue-Ats-On-Checksum-Failure Flag

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: This parameter specifies the default state to continue an ATS when a command in the ATS fails checksum validation

simplesect.title: Limits:
simplesect.para: Must be TUE or FALSE

xrefdescription.para: Defines the TIME SC should use for its commands

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: This parameter defines what type of time SC should use for sending uot its commands

simplesect.title: Limits:
simplesect.para: Must be SC_USE_CFE_TIME, SC_USE_TAI, or SC_USE_UTC

xrefdescription.para: Define inclusion state for RTS group commands

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: This parameter specifies the inclusion state for the following RTS group commands: Start RTS group, Stop RTS group, Enable RTS group and Disable RTS group. RTS group commands affect a range of consecutive RTS numbers. When set to TRUE, this definition results in the inclusion of the group command handlers into the SC source code.

simplesect.title: Limits:
simplesect.para: Must be defined as TRUE or FALSE

xrefdescription.para: Mission specific version number for SC application

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: An application version number consists of four parts: major version number, minor version number, revision number and mission specific revision number. The mission specific revision number is defined here and the other parts are defined in "sc_version.h".

simplesect.title: Limits:
simplesect.para: Must be defined as a numeric value that is greater than or equal to zero.
